content: The Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet is one of the Key Items you can find within Black Myth: Wukong. This Key Item is a part of a long quest within The New West, revolving around Chen Loong, one of the bosses and NPCs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Special-made_Bone-Strengthening_Pellet.md', within the main section titled 'Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet'.
The content is as follows:
The Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet is one of the Key Items you can find within Black Myth: Wukong. This Key Item is a part of a long quest within The New West, revolving around Chen Loong, one of the bosses and NPCs.
